name: Lance McCarthy
bio: Microsoft MVP with a love for all things .NET, software development, and engineering.
tags: .NET MAUI, .NET, C#, XAML, ASP.NET, CI-CD, GitHub Actions, Azure DevOps, Mixed Reality, Windows Dev, Blazor, UWP, WinRT, WinUI, Xamarin.Forms, dotnet

projects.name: GitHub Action AzureBlobUpload
projects.description: A GitHub action to upload files to Azure Blob storage, compatible with all Actions runner operating systems.

projects.name: DevOps Examples
projects.description: A repo to show you how to use a private NuGet feed to restore packages in Azure DevOps, GitHub Actions, GitLab CI and AppCenter

projects.name: Password Purgatory for .NET
projects.description: A reimagining of Troy Hunt's Password Purgatory in .NET

projects.name: GitHub Actions for Desktop Apps
projects.description: This repo contains a sample WPF application to demonstrate how to create CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions.

projects.name: MediaFileManager
projects.description: An application that simplifies tedious and numerous media file naming operations (i.e. renaming, episode numbering, etc). This repo uses GH Actions to build, package and distribute a WPF application to the Microsoft Store.

projects.name: CommonHelpers
projects.description: A .NET Standard library, distributed via NuGet.org, containing a set of very frequently used classes, interfaces, and behaviors needed in every day projects.

projects.name: AKeyless Action
projects.description: The only (and currently official) GitHub Action to let you use AKeyless static secrets and dynamic secrets in your workflows.

projects.name: UWP Controls
projects.description: A set of custom controls, helpers, and utilities for the .NET and UWP app developer.

projects.name: XKCD Viewer
projects.description: A cross-platform application showing the use of the xkcd comic strip API.

projects.name: Latte Locator
projects.description: A interactively-pleasing app that uses the Starbucks API for a variety of functionality.

projects.name: Custom Xamarin Demos
projects.description: A set of specialized custom example applications for edge cases.

projects.name: Custom .NET MAUI Examples
projects.description: A set of specialized custom .NET MAUI applications for edge cases.

projects.name: Remix 3D Downloader
projects.description: An application that lets you quickly download 3D models from Remix 3D. This functionality is not available via the website.
